public.name: extend
public.help: This is a slightly modified version of http://api.jquery.com/jQuery.extend/

parameters.name: target
parameters.help: The target object to copy to.

public.name: getProperty

returns.help: the value of the property or null if property isn't found .

public.help: Gets an objects property by string.

parameters.name: prop
parameters.help: The property whose value will be returned.

public.name: isPlainObject

returns.help: - true if the object is plain, otherwise false.

public.help: This is a slightly modified version of jQuery.isPlainObject. A plain object is an object whose internal class property is [object Object].

public.name: mixin
public.help: Mixes the source object into the destination object, returning the newly modified destination object.\nBased on original code by @mudcube

parameters.name: from
parameters.help: The object to copy (the source object).

parameters.name: to
parameters.help: The object to copy to (the destination object).

public.name: pad
public.help: Javascript string pad http://www.webtoolkit.info/.\npad = the string to pad it out with (defaults to a space)\ndir = 1 (left), 2 (right), 3 (both)

parameters.name: len
parameters.help: The number of characters to be added.

parameters.name: pad
parameters.help: The string to pad it out with (defaults to a space).

public.name: parseDimension
public.help: Get a unit dimension from a string.

public.name: rotateArray
public.help: Rotates the given array.\nBased on the routine from http://jsfiddle.net/MrPolywhirl/NH42z/

parameters.name: direction
parameters.help: The amount to rotate. Either a number: 90, -90, 270, -270, 180 or a string: 'rotateLeft', 'rotateRight' or 'rotate180'

public.name: setProperty

returns.help: The object on which the property was set.

public.help: Sets an objects property by string.

parameters.name: prop
parameters.help: The property whose value will be changed

public.name: shuffle
public.help: A standard Fisher-Yates Array shuffle implementation.

public.name: transposeArray
public.help: Transposes the elements of the given Array.
